Argentina's President Milei to visit Israel in display of supportArgentina's President Javier Milei said on Friday he would travel to Israel in the "coming weeks," one of his first overseas trips since the libertarian economist took office last month after pledging strong support for Israel during his campaign. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:52:40 GMT EEBVEJNU3ZMETLI3LTQABIWAII https://www.reuters.com/world/argentina-president-milei-visits-israel-display-support-2024-01-26/Candelaria Grimberg世界
Ecuador top court blocks nine questions for referendumEcuador's top court has blocked nine questions that President Daniel Noboa wanted to put to Ecuadoreans in a referendum on security issues, arguing they failed to meet constitutional requirements, it said on Friday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:49:50 GMT UY7KNXCHNVMYDMNJS3NNLLWHDU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuador-top-court-blocks-nine-questions-referendum-2024-01-26/Alexandra Valencia世界美洲
EU Council President Michel drops plan to run in European Parliament electionCharles Michel, the president of the council of European Union leaders, said on Friday he was abandoning his plan to run for a seat in the European Parliament, saying he did not want attacks on his decision to distract from his current mission. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:42:34 GMT XPLW4ZULMVLLJCZWCD7DGHRARE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-council-president-michel-drops-plan-run-european-parliament-election-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
German state broadcaster urges Israel to let 2 workers leave GazaGerman state broadcaster ARD on Friday said Israel was blocking two of its long-term Palestinian workers from leaving Gaza, where they fear for their lives, citing security concerns the broadcaster said did not make sense. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:33:26 GMT DBYMJVY64ZKY3J4TX4HKKQBPHY https://www.reuters.com/world/german-state-broadcaster-urges-israel-to-let-2-workers-leave-gaza-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
France confirms interest in building nuclear plant in PolandFrance has confirmed its interest in participating in Poland's nuclear energy programme and building the country's planned second nuclear power plant, the Polish climate ministry said on Friday after a meeting of top government officials. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:14:34 GMT RCAMY7MJDFLLVOTMKBLNXZXW6U https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/france-confirms-interest-building-nuclear-plant-poland-2024-01-26/Reuters世界欧洲
Colombia human rights ombudsman urges action to prevent firesColombia's human rights ombudsman on Friday urged local authorities of high-risk areas where fires have not occurred to take preventative action, as 34 blazes continued to burn throughout the Andean country. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 17:54:59 GMT T3OACI6EDJJ4PCCXHYAENLZPMM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/colombia- human-rights-ombudsman-urges-action-prevent-fires-2024-01-26/Oliver Griffin可持续发展社会与公平
France, Germany, UK condemn Iran's launch of Soraya satelliteFrance, Germany and Britain on Friday condemned Iran's launch of the Soraya satellite last week using the Ghaem-100 Space Launch Vehicle (SLV). Fri, 26 Jan 2024 17:41:43 GMT 4YNH57TW4FPU7PA742XF4V7ZZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/france-germany-uk-condemns-iran-launch-soraya-satellite-2024-01-26/Reuters世界
ICJ ruling: Key takeaways from the court decision in Israel genocide caseThe International Court of Justice (ICJ) ordered Israel on Friday to take action to prevent acts of genocide as it wages war against Hamas militants in the Gaza Strip but stopped short of calling for an immediate ceasefire. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 17:17:42 GMT MMXXMRIURNMMHK5INZQO2LGRNE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/key-takeaways-world-court-decision-israei-genocide-case-2024-01-26/Reuters世界中东地区
2024 Republican Nevada caucus and primary: When are they? What's at stake?The next showdown in the Republican nominating fight between Donald Trump and Nikki Haley takes place in Nevada in early February. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 17:11:50 GMT X3SJRRVM2RPKZNMXPDGSROSFQY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/2024-republican-nevada-caucus-primary-when-are-they-whats-stake-2024-01-26/Tim Reid世界美国
Red Sea, China risks to US economy seem contained, White House saysThe United States risks some exposure to China's economic slowdown and shipping disruptions in the Red Sea, but they appear contained, President Joe Biden's top economic adviser said on Friday, adding that the U.S. economy is "upbeat." Fri, 26 Jan 2024 16:54:00 GMT W2RA4JBBWFKSPL5PHC2WVMOWGU https://www.reuters.com/world/us/red-sea-china-risks-us-economy-seem-contained-white-house-says-2024-01-26/Trevor Hunnicutt世界美国
Exclusive: Canada to re-start Turkey arms exports after Sweden NATO backing -sourcesCanada and Turkey have reached a deal to restart Canadian exports of drone parts in exchange for more transparency on where they are used, and it would take effect after Ankara completes its ratification of Sweden's NATO bid, two sources told Reuters. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 15:17:34 GMT FGVZIFJ3LZPZTOZ2X4RCWAKZLA https://www.reuters.com/world/canada-re-start-turkey-arms-exports-after-sweden-nato-backing-sources-2024-01-26/Jonathan Spicer世界
